articles.title: EU to open membership talks with Ukraine and Moldova - BBC.com
articles.description: Ukraine's President Volodymyr Zelensky hails the decision as "a victory" for his country and Europe.
articles.content:
By Jessica Parker in Kyiv & Paul Kirby in LondonBBC News
European leaders have decided to open EU membership talks with Ukraine and Moldova and to grant candidate status to Georgia.

articles.title: European Central Bank holds rates and trims its inflation forecast - CNBC

articles.author: Andrew Wright
articles.title: Rio Ferdinand on Newcastle United's European exit - 'At this level you have to punish teams' - Eurosport COM
articles.description: Rio Ferdinand said Newcastle United were made to pay for not capitalising on their first-half dominance against AC Milan in the UEFA Champions League.
articles.content:
Bruno Guimaraes of Newcastle United is dejected after the UEFA Champions League match between Newcastle United FC and AC Milan at St. James Park on December 13, 2023.
